tool_description: Checks vendor availability for specific event dates and times, including setup and breakdown requirements, and identifies scheduling conflicts.

vendor_ids.description: List of vendor identifiers to check availability for

event_start_date.description: Event start date and time in ISO 8601 format

event_end_date.description: Event end date and time in ISO 8601 format

setup_hours.description: Hours needed before event for setup

breakdown_hours.description: Hours needed after event for breakdown and cleanup

error_messages: Invalid date range: event_end_date must be after event_start_date.
Past event date: event_start_date cannot be in the past.
Invalid setup/breakdown time: setup_hours and breakdown_hours must be positive numbers.
Vendor availability data unavailable: Unable to retrieve availability information for one or more vendors.
usage: Provide vendor_ids, event_start_date, event_end_date, setup_hours, and breakdown_hours. The tool checks each vendor's calendar and returns availability status for the complete time period needed.

available_vendors.description: Vendor IDs that are available for the requested time period

unavailable_vendors.description: Vendor IDs that are not available for the requested time period

partial_availability.description: Vendors with partial availability or scheduling conflicts

availability_summary.description: Summary of availability status for all checked vendors
